meanings.sent1: She withdrew the money from her bank account.
meanings.sent2: He withdrew his hand from the hot stove quickly.
meanings.sent3: The magician withdrew the rabbit from the hat to the audience's amazement.
meanings.sent4: The sun slowly withdrew its light as the day turned into night.
meanings.sent5: The teacher withdrew the privilege of recess from the misbehaving students.

meanings.sent1: The withdrawn student preferred reading alone during lunch.
meanings.sent2: She appeared withdrawn and quiet in social gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The withdrawn cat hid under the bed whenever guests visited.
meanings.sent4: His withdrawn nature made it challenging for him to make new friends.
meanings.sent5: The withdrawn child found solace in painting and drawing.

meanings.sent1: After the argument, he became withdrawn from the group activities.
meanings.sent2: She felt withdrawn from the project after her ideas were dismissed.
meanings.sent3: The withdrawn employee decided to focus on personal projects instead.
meanings.sent4: The withdrawn member of the team chose to work independently.
meanings.sent5: Feeling withdrawn from the conversation, she decided to leave the room.
